item.title: HowTo use Git for Collaborative Development
item.author: troglobit@gmail.com (Joachim Nilsson)
item.description: This is mainly some notes for myself so I don’t forget. Having worked with GNU Bazaar before much of Git is still alien to me. This HowTo is divided into two parts: what happens on your laptop, and what you must do on a remote server where you publish your changes So, let’s start stimple: laptop> mkdir projectX; cd projectX laptop> git init laptop> emacs file1.txt laptop> git add file1.
